title: Ranger Premium Watch Face
summary: Exclusive Sci-Fi Vintage Machine Look For Your Android Wear
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: This exclusive Sci-Fi Watch will gloom your Smart watch with Style, and comes with the best user experience ever designed for a smart watch. Built in features like custom Needles, Battery Indicator and information such as miss calls, emails, and messages. Frillroid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable. Key custom features :-• Latest Weather updates• Classic Design• Ultimate readability • Clean and simplistic look • Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear LiveVisit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
This exclusive Sci-Fi Watch will gloom your Smart watch with Style, and comes with the best user experience ever designed for a smart watch. Built in features like custom Needles, Battery Indicator and information such as miss calls, emails, and messages. Frillroid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.

Key custom features :-
• Latest Weather updates
• Classic Design
• Ultimate readability
• Clean and simplistic look
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever

This watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live
Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
How it works?
Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Looks beautiful but... ...force closes when trying to reach settings from Android Wear app. Android 4.4.4 and ZenWatch
My Favorite Clean, simple, functional. Lasts a full day on Gear Live watch.  Well done.
It's not bad But for those who don't care about saving battery, full ambient mode would be nice.
